memo: E800 Set Up [Part 1: 安装及接线篇]
E800 Set Up [Part2 :电机驱动篇[操作面板]]
title: E800 Set Up [Part2 :电机驱动篇[操作面板]]
description: 通过三菱电机通用变频器FR-E800驱动电机。下面将要讲解的，是如何通过操作面板发出启动指令和频率指令，从而进行PU运行模式下的电机驱动。此外，还会讲解加减速时间的设定。

memo: E800 Set Up [Part3 :电机驱动篇[外部开关]]
title: E800 Set Up [Part3 :电机驱动篇[外部开关]]
description: 通过三菱电机通用变频器FR-E800驱动电机。下面将要讲解的，是如何通过开关发出启动指令和频率指令从而进行外部运行模式下的电机驱动。 此外，还会讲解加减速时间的设定。

memo: E800 Set Up [Part 4:网络篇]
title: E800 Set Up [Part 4:网络篇]
description: 使用三菱电机通用变频器FR-E800时，关于如何进行CC-Link IE TSN通讯，以下对其设定方法进行说明。

memo: 变频器 FR-E800
title: 变频器 FR-E800
description:
最小等级的高性能变频器
小型机身配有开放式网络和功能安全
[特点]
1. 通过“CC-Link IE TSN”实现智能工厂
・配备Ethernet接口 2端口
・支持以CC-Link IE TSN为代表的多种Ethernet通讯
2. 实现驱动设备与人的安全协作
・支持功能安全标准（IEC61508、SIL3等）
・支持安全通讯协议
3. 变频器辅助设备保全
・通过配备了AI技术的“FR Configurator2”，可以对发生报警停止的原因进行分析并进行特殊支援
・通过腐蚀性气体的检测来预知变频器的损伤状况从而促进改善

memo: FR-A800 Set Up [Part1 开箱·安装篇]
title: FR-A800 Set Up [Part1 开箱·安装篇]
description: 本视频是三菱电机通用变频器FR-A800的开箱、安装和设置演示。

title: FR-A800 Set Up [Part4 [基本功能篇　-加速时间/减速时间-］

memo: 变频器 FREQROL-CS80
title: 变频器 FREQROL-CS80
description:
凝缩多样化功能
小型智能变频器
[特点]
1. 世界最小级别 小型机身
通过低发热设计，实现机身的小型化。
2. 高性能
配备了通用磁通矢量控制和自动调谐功能。
3. 操作简便
与GOT的连接简单
4. 维护简单
恶劣的周围环境时也可以使用

memo: 三菱電機 变频器 摘要
title: 三菱電機 变频器 摘要
description: 以最佳选择响应所有需求\nINVERTER FR变频器是可简单自由地改变三相感应电机转数的可变频率电源装置。\n高性能且环保，还符合全球标准。可根据用途从丰富多样的产品阵容中进行选购。

memo: FREQROL-A800
title: FREQROL-A800
description: 高功能·高性能变频器 FR-A系列\n具有FR系列最高驱动性能的变频器。\n实时无传感器矢量控制、矢量控制将满足所有机械需求。

memo: FREQROL-F800
title: FREQROL-F800
description:
风机、泵、空调、变频器
FR-F系列
不仅搭载有多个节能功能，还搭载有最适用于风机·泵的功能。
响应客户多样的节能需求。

memo: FREQROL-E700
title: FREQROL-E700
description:
简单·强力的小型变频器
FR-E系列。
易用性出类拔萃，具有最高等级的驱动性能！
小身躯的全能型产品。

memo: FREQROL-D700
title: FREQROL-D700
description: 简单·小型变频器 FR-D系列\n简单小型的三菱电机基准。\n这是三菱电机的新基准。

memo: Mitsubishi Electric Ship solution
title: Mitsubishi Electric Ship solution
description: Opening a new passage with Mitsubishi Electric FA products.\nImproved energy saving and high precision control for ship facilities with leading-edge technology developed for the FA field.

memo: Mitsubishi electric Inverter Digest
title: Mitsubishi electric Inverter Digest
description:
The best choice for a completerange of applications.
Inverters are variable frequency power supply units which can change the rotation speed of the three-phase induction motors easily and flexibly.
High-performance and environmentally friendly inverter compliant with global standards.
An extensive range of models are available according to application.

memo: FR-A800
title: FR-A800
description: High performance and high quality new inverter of the highest level.\nThe FR-A series offer the best drive performance in the FR series.\nThe enhanced Real sensorless vector control and vector control serve the needs of all machinery types.

memo: FR-E700
title: FR-E700
description: Simple, powerful, and compact inverter FR-E series.\nOffers remarkable usability and top level driving performance!\nAll-rounder in a compact body.

memo: FR-D700
title: FR-D700
description: Easy and compact inverter FR-D series.\nEasy and compact, Mitsubishi Electric's standard.\nThis is Mitsubishi Electric's new standard.

memo: Inverter FREQROL-CS80
title: Inverter FREQROL-CS80
description:
Various Functions in a Small Body
Compact and Smart Inverter
[Features]
1. World's smallest class compact body
Compact size achieved by the low heat generation design
2. High performance
General-Purpose magnetic flux vector control and auto tuning functions are available.
3. Easy to use
Easy connection with GOTs
4. Easy maintenance
Protected in hazardous environments

memo: Inverter FR-E800
title: Inverter FR-E800
description:
World's smallest class inverter with high functionality
Compact inverter with open network and functional safety functions
[Features]
1. Smart factory with CC-Link IE TSN
・Two Ethernet ports
・Supporting various Ethernet networks
2. Safe human-machine cooperation
・Compliant with safety integrity level (SIL) 2 or 3 of the IEC 61508 standard for functional safety
・Supporting safety communication protocols
3. Supporting system maintenance
・Function to predict and alert operators of inverter's damage caused by corrosive gas
・AI technology of FR Configurator2 helps analyze and identify the cause of a fault.

memo: E800 Set Up [Part 2: Driving a Motor Using the Operation Panel]
title: E800 Set Up [Part 2: Driving a Motor Using the Operation Panel]
description: In this video, we will explain how to drive a motor using the Mitsubishi Electric FR-E800 inverter. The inverter's operation panel is used to give start and frequency commands to drive the motor in the PU operation mode. We will also explain how to set acceleration and deceleration times.

memo: E800 Set Up [Part 3: Driving a Motor Using External Switches]
title: E800 Set Up [Part 3: Driving a Motor Using External Switches]
description: In this video, we will explain how to drive a motor using the Mitsubishi Electric FR-E800 inverter. when external switches are used to give both start and frequency commands to drive the motor in the external operation mode. We will also explain how to set acceleration and deceleration times.

memo: E800 Set Up [Part 4: Network Connection]
title: E800 Set Up [Part 4: Network Connection]
description: We will explain the settings for CC-Link IE TSN communication using the Mitsubishi Electric FR-E800 inverter.

memo: Inverter FR-A800 Set Up [Part 1: Unpacking & Installation]
title: Inverter FR-A800 Set Up [Part 1: Unpacking & Installation]
description: In this video, we will explain how to set up the Mitsubishi Electric FR-A800 general-purpose inverter from unpacking to installing the inverter in an enclosure.

memo: Inverter FR-A800 Set Up [Part 2: Wiring]
title: Inverter FR-A800 Set Up [Part 2: Wiring]
description: This video will explain the wiring procedures for the Mitsubishi Electric FR-A800 general-purpose inverter.

memo: Inverter FR-A800 Set Up [Part 3: Basic Functions -Torque Boost-]
title: Inverter FR-A800 Set Up [Part 3: Basic Functions -Torque Boost-]
description: In this video, we will explain how to set the basic torque boost function of the Mitsubishi Electric FR-A800 general-purpose inverter.

memo: Inverter FR-A800 Set Up [Part 4: Basic Functions-Acceleration & deceleration times-]
title: Inverter FR-A800 Set Up [Part 4: Basic Functions-Acceleration & deceleration times-]
description: In this video, we will explain how to set basic acceleration and deceleration time settings of the Mitsubishi Electric FR-A800 general-purpose inverter.

memo: E800 Set Up [Part 1: Installation & Wiring]
title: E800 Set Up [Part 1: Installation & Wiring]
description: In this video, we will explain how to set up the Mitsubishi Electric FR-E800 general-purpose inverter.

memo: 三菱电机变频器FR 40周年纪念视频
title: 三菱电机变频器FR 40周年纪念视频
description:
三菱电机通用变频器FR系列，于2021年迎来了40周年。
2022年。累计出厂台数已达到2500万台。
三菱电机通用变频器极大的改变了变频器的世界，诞生了一系列充分考虑人与环境的优秀产品。支撑生活 创造未来三菱电机通用变频器。
历经40年，将向更高的目标持续迈进。

关于2022年2月发布的“三菱电机变频器FR 40周年纪念视频”的英文版和中文版视频，其中的英文解说音频合同期限将于2025年2月到期。
如果您个人下载了2022年发布的该视频，请删除并使用更新后的新视频（2024年9月发布）。
给您带来不便，敬请谅解。

memo: Mitsubishi Electric Inverter FR Series 40th Anniversary Video
title: Mitsubishi Electric Inverter FR Series 40th Anniversary Video
description:
Mitsubishi Electric FR series inverters marked its 40th anniversary in 2021.
And in 2022,cumulative shipments exceeded 25 million units.
Mitsubishi Electric inverters have been innovative, ecological, and user-friendly products.
To make the future by supporting daily life, Mitsubishi Electric inverters will continue evolving, following the 40-year history.

Be advised that the contract period for the English narration audio for the English and Chinese versions of the Mitsubishi Electric Inverter FR Series 40th Anniversary Video, released in February 2022, will expire in February 2025.
If you have already downloaded the existing video files released in 2022, please discard them and use the new updated videos (released in September 2024) instead.
We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

memo: インバータ D800 Set Up [Part1 盤取付・配線編]

description: 三菱電機汎用インバータFREQROL-D800のセットアップをしていきます。

memo: インバータ D800 Set Up [Part2 モータ駆動編（操作パネル）]
title: インバータ D800 Set Up [Part2 モータ駆動編（操作パネル）]
description: 三菱電機汎用インバータFREQROL-D800でモータを駆動します。\n始動指令、周波数指令ともに操作パネルで行う場合のPU運転モードでの\nモータ駆動を説明します。

memo: インバータ D800 Set Up [Part3 モータ駆動編（外部スイッチ）]
title: インバータ D800 Set Up [Part3 モータ駆動編（外部スイッチ）]
description: 三菱電機汎用インバータFREQROL-D800でモータを駆動します。\n始動指令、周波数指令ともに外部スイッチを使用した外部運転モードでのモータ駆動について説明します。

memo: インバータ FR-D800
title: インバータ FR-D800 プロモーション
description:
「その進化は私たち未来につながっている」
FR-D800シリーズはFR-D700シリーズのメリットを継承。
最小クラスのサイズ感はそのままに、使いやすさ、選びやすさがUP！

＜特長＞
1．使いやすさを追求（User Friendly）
　・配線作業をスピーディに
　・パソコン給電で設定が可能
2．選びやすさを革新（Simple to Adapt）
　・多様なモータ制御も、FR-D800 におまかせ
3．環境性能を進化(Eco Friendly)
　・地球にやさしい選択を
　・つくる責任

memo: INVERTER FR-D800 Promotion
title: INVERTER FR-D800 Promotion
description:
DQThis evolution paves the way for our futureDQ
Inherits the advantages of the FR-D700 series.
Keeps the smallest class body,
becomes further easier to choose and easier to use.

＜Features＞
1．Quest for ease of use (User Friendly)
　・Quicker wiring
　・Settings using power supplied from the computer
2．Revolution in ease of selection (Simple to Adapt)
　・Various motor controls by the FR-D800 inverter
3．Advanced environmental performance (Eco Friendly)
　・Eco-friendly choice
　・Responsibility of manufacturing

memo: 变频器 FR-D800 创新升级
title: 变频器 FR-D800 创新升级
description:
「开拓创新与我们的未来息息相关 」
FR-D800系列继承了FR-D700系列的优点。
最小等级的机身保持不变、易用性、易选性 UP!

＜特点＞
1．实现易用性（User Friendly）
　·实现快速接线作业
　·可通过计算机供电对变频器进行相关设定
2．易选性的创新（Simple to Adapt）
　·FR-D800支持多种电机控制
3．环境性能的改善(Eco Friendly)
　·保护地球环境的优选
　·为低碳社会做贡献
